details:
Pomerium is an open source identity-aware access proxy. Changes to the OIDC claims of a user after initial login are not reflected in policy evaluation when using allowed_idp_claims as part of policy. If using allowed_idp_claims and a user's claims are changed, Pomerium can make incorrect authorization decisions.

For users unable to upgrade clear data on databroker service by clearing redis or restarting the in-memory databroker to force claims to be updated.
